statements: SELECT policy_id, premium_amount, coverage_type, coverage_limit FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT coverage_type, policy_id, coverage_limit, premium_amount FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT coverage_limit, premium_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type, premium_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_limit > 50000;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE policy_id = 100;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_limit > 5000;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 AND coverage_limit > 10000;
SELECT coverage_type, premium_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_type != 'Life' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM PolicyHolders WHERE policy_id = 1001;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT holder_id, policy_id, holder_name FROM PolicyHolders WHERE holder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE premium_amount < 10000 ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE coverage_type = 'life';
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM PolicyHolders WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT SUM(premium_amount) FROM PolicyCoverageDetails GROUP BY coverage_type;
SELECT coverage_type, MAX(coverage_limit) FROM PolicyCoverageDetails GROUP BY coverage_type;
SELECT * FROM coverage_type;
SELECT coverage_name, description FROM coverage_type;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_name, description FROM coverage_type WHERE coverage_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM premium_details ORDER BY coverage_id DESC;
SELECT coverage_id, SUM(premium_amount) AS total_premium FROM premium_details GROUP BY coverage_id;
SELECT * FROM coverage_type;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_name FROM coverage_type WHERE coverage_name = 'Health';
SELECT coverage_name, description FROM coverage_type ORDER BY coverage_name ASC;
SELECT coverage_id, MAX(premium_amount) AS max_premium FROM premium_details GROUP BY coverage_id;
SELECT * FROM coverage_type WHERE coverage_id IN (SELECT coverage_id FROM coverage_limits WHERE max_limit > 1000);
SELECT * FROM coverage_type;
SELECT name, coverage_type_id FROM coverage_type ORDER BY coverage_type_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type_id = 1;
SELECT coverage_type.name, premium_amount.amount FROM coverage_type JOIN premium_amount ON coverage_type.coverage_type_id = premium_amount.coverage_type_id;
SELECT * FROM coverage_type;
SELECT name FROM coverage_type WHERE coverage_type_id = 1;
SELECT name, amount FROM coverage_type JOIN premium_amount ON coverage_type.coverage_type_id = premium_amount.coverage_type_id;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type_id = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, min_limit, max_limit FROM coverage_type JOIN coverage_limits ON coverage_type.coverage_type_id = coverage_limits.coverage_type_id WHERE name LIKE 'Auto%' ORDER BY max_limit ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM PolicyHolders WHERE policy_id = 1001;
SELECT policy_id, MAX(amount_paid) AS max_payment FROM PremiumPayments GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT DISTINCT coverage_type FROM CoverageLimits WHERE max_limit > 10000;
SELECT renewal_id, policy_id, renewal_date, new_premium_amount FROM PolicyRenewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE premium_amount > 5000 ORDER BY coverage_type DESC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM PolicyHolders WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount_paid < 1000;
SELECT policy_id, renewl_date FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE new_premium_amount > 2000;
SELECT coverage_type, max_limit, min_limit FROM CoverageLimits WHERE max_limit - min_limit > 5000 ORDER BY max_limit ASC;
